name: Grand Shield
description:
This is a short prototype for A bullet hell rhythm platformer where a knight equipped with a shield must face the bosses and survive till the song is over. Controls:

MoveWASDJump Space Dash Left Shift Block Right Click

The dash and block mechanics work in the directions of the mouse.

This game was a project for our module in our University course, as a result it isn't a very optimized build and isn't likely to be updated further.
